data.title: The Bread Peddler (1916 film)
data.meta_description: The Bread Peddler is a 1916 Italian silent drama film directed by Giovanni Enrico Vidali. It is based on the novel of the same name by Xavier de Montépin.
data.text:
The Bread Peddler (Italian:La portatrice di pane) is a 1916 Italian silent drama film directed by Giovanni Enrico Vidali.[1] It is based on the novel of the same name by Xavier de Montépin.
